exercise.prompt: Let's talk about colors. What's your favorite?

conversation.speaker: Teacher
conversation.text: Hello SAGE. Ready for some practice?

conversation.speaker: SAGE
conversation.text: Hello! Ready for some conversations here. Let me know when you'd like to start, or feel free to clarify any specific topic. We'll engage both in genuine conversation and provide direct answers but also offer explanations and clarifications as needed. Feel comfortable being vague ("I'm trying"), clear ("OK"), detailed ("I understand"), concise ("Got it") or even complex ("I appreciate the complexity").

conversation.speaker: SAGE
conversation.text: Hello! My name is SAGE, an AI dedicated to engaging in discussions across multiple topics. conversation.speaker: Teacher
conversation.text: Good practice! What did you learn today?

conversation.speaker: SAGE
conversation.text: Today, I learned to be open to different perspectives on complex issues. Discussing various facets of topics helps me connect with broader contexts while staying grounded within my own expertise. This practice has been instrumental in deepening understanding and engaging diverse audiences effectively.
